posts.description:
Shaun King on Twitter: "A stunning 55 NYPD police officers have lost TEN or more misconduct lawsuits and are STILL ON THE JOB. 

Officer Peter Valentin sued 28x."
posts.extended: RT @djmlaw1: Is there a single person reading this who would still have job if your employer lost 10 lawsuits over your conduct?

posts.description: SUNY New Paltz on Twitter: ""New Paltz’s @makerbot Innovation Center empowers students & community entrepreneurs alike." ~ CEO Jonathan Jaglom http://t.co/rpiSIquyD6"
posts.extended: "New Paltz’s @makerbot Innovation Center empowers students & community entrepreneurs alike." ~ CEO Jonathan Jaglom
